desc.text: Smash on this button to get your invitation link:
You need to provide a email address with whitelisted domain in order to get the invitation link. You should receive an invitation email within a few minutes.
On account creation page, enter your in-game name and password. Finally, press on the create button.
In-game name field represents the name that display in game. It's the 'username' for login authentication. Therefore it MUST match with the in-game name of the account you use!
We have an independant database, therefore you must register before you can join our server.
Make sure the in-game name is matched as the one you registered and the game version is set to the correct version.
Run Minecraft and in Multiplayer, click on Direct Connect, enter the following address:
Click connect and you should be able to join the server.

Once you get into the server, you will be asked to enter your password. Press '/' to and enter 'login' into the message box following by a space and then your password. It should look something like this:
If you get kicked immediately upon connecting the server, means that the in-game name you using is not registered.
Press enter to execute. If your password is correct, you should be able to play the game.
